meanings.definition: A person who makes or sells spurs.
meanings.sent1: The local spurriers crafted beautiful spurs for the knights.
meanings.sent2: The spurriers at the market had a wide variety of spurs for sale.
meanings.sent3: The spurriers decided to have a spur-making competition for fun.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, the designers were the spurriers of style.
meanings.sent5: The old blacksmith was known as the best spurrier in town.

meanings.sent1: The group of spurriers gathered to discuss their craft.
meanings.sent2: The shop displayed a collection of spurriers from different eras.
meanings.sent3: The spurriers traveled in a pack, each with their own unique style.
meanings.sent4: The field was filled with spurriers, each with a different specialty.
meanings.sent5: The museum showcased the history of spurriers and their work.
